text: Glasgow Central station is a mainline railway station in Glasgow, Scotland. It first opened in 1879. The station typically serves areas south of the city such as Motherwell or London however has since branched out to areas such as Wemyss Bay in the west and Edinburgh in the east. Current operators at this station include ScotRail, Caledonian Sleeper, LNER, Transpennine Express and Avanti West Coast. Current trains that serve this station include the Class 73, Class 86, Class 90, Class 92, Class 156, Class 314, Class 318, Class 320, Class 321, Class 380, Class 385, Class 390, Class 397 and Class 80x. title: Glasgow Central station
